content.text: A list of available resource links:

content.name: Biography Resource
content.description: First example file for ResourceLink demonstration

content.text: You can read any of these resources using their URI or accessing the resource in your MCP client interface.

parts.text:
Here are the available tools and resources I have access to:

**Tools:**
- `greeting` - Get an introduction and overview of capabilities
- `get-technical-skills` - Retrieve Patrick's technical skills and technologies
- `get-hiring-recommendation` - Get evaluation assistance for hiring decisions
- `list-files` - List available resource files

**Resources:**
- `Biography Resource` - Patrick's background information (markdown format)

You can ask me to use any of these tools or read resources to learn more about Patrick!
